item.title: Putin floats idea of UN-led government in Ukraine
item.description: The move is seen as an attempt to challenge the legitimacy of the current authorities in Kyiv.

item.title: Under-fire Zimbabwe president names new army chief
item.description: It comes ahead of planned protests by a group of war veterans who want Emmerson Mnangagwa to resign.

item.title: Moment Bangkok high-rise under construction collapses
item.description: Workers are feared trapped following the collapse of a high-rise building in Thailand's capital.

item.title: Greenlanders prepare for uncomfortable visit from US vice-president
item.description: Greenland is giving the cold shoulder to JD Vance and his wife, amid Trump's pledge to take control of the island.

item.title: Superfans and spiderman: Africa's top shots
item.description: A selection of the week's best photos from across the African continent and beyond.
